rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment provides factual statistics without using high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment discusses export forecasts (financial/trade metric), which is treated as Neutral per rules.
The segment reports an export forecast but contains no explicit calming language.
No minimiser ('only', 'just', 'merely', 'a single', 'few') combined with an explicit scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes US export forecast, not capabilities or preparedness.
Reports numerical metrics of export volume ('export 3.4 million tons', 'total global export of 13.4 million tons').
